original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ma h'a s'u tra sa mu tstsha ya n'a ma /
analyzed: ma h'a s'u tra sa mu tstsha ya n'a ma /
translated: Mahasutrasamuccaya-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mdo kun las btus pa chen po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: mdo kun las btus pa chen po zhes bya ba /
translated: The Great Compendium of Sutras

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One!

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: gzhi chen po'i mdo las /🔽yang ji ltar dge slong dag gis mdo sde dag las don phyung nas gtam du bya ba sbyor bar 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing chos bstan pa mthar gyis yang dag par gnas par 'tshal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhi chen po'i mdo las / yang ji ltar dge slong dag gis mdo sde dag las don phyung nas gtam du bya ba sbyor bar 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing chos bstan pa mthar gyis yang dag par gnas par 'tshal bar 'gyur /
translated: In the Mahavastu Sutra,🔽the monks asked the Blessed One, How can we extract the meaning from the sutras and engage in discourse, and how can we understand the gradual and correct abiding of the Dharma teachings?

original: ji ltar na 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing mdo sde nyams par mi 'gyur ba nyid lags zhes dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing mdo sde nyams par mi 'gyur ba nyid lags zhes dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: How can we avoid regret and not let the sutras decline? The Blessed One replied,

original: ngas gnang bar bya yis /
analyzed: ngas gnang bar bya yis /
translated: I grant permission.

original: mdo sde dag las don phung nas gtam du bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: mdo sde dag las don phung nas gtam du bya ba sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: You should extract the meaning from the sutras and engage in discourse.

original: chos ston pa'i rim pa mthar gyis yang dag par gnas par bya /
analyzed: chos ston pa'i rim pa mthar gyis yang dag par gnas par bya /
translated: The stages of teaching the Dharma should be gradually and correctly established.

original: mdo sde dag kyang de kho na ltar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo sde dag kyang de kho na ltar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: The sūtras should be arranged in the same way.🔽Mahāprajāpatī heard that your son performed various miracles,

original: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos khyod kyi bu 'di cho 'phrul ya ma zung mdzad de sku'i smad nas me 'bar /
analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos khyod kyi bu 'di cho 'phrul ya ma zung mdzad de sku'i smad nas me 'bar /
translated: with fire blazing from the lower part of his body

original: sku'i stod nas chu'i rgyun bsil ba 'bab /🔽sku'i @2a * //
analyzed: sku'i stod nas chu'i rgyun bsil ba 'bab / sku'i @2a * //
translated: and a stream of cool water flowing from the upper part of his body.

original: stod nas me 'bar /
analyzed: stod nas me 'bar /
translated: With fire blazing from the upper part of his body

original: sku'i smad nas chu'i rgyun bsil ba 'bab po zhes thos so //
analyzed: sku'i smad nas chu'i rgyun bsil ba 'bab po zhes thos so //
translated: and a stream of cool water flowing from the lower part of his body.

original: thos nas kyang dga' mgu yi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
analyzed: thos nas kyang dga' mgu yi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
translated: Having heard this, she was delighted, joyful, and overjoyed, and experienced supreme joy and mental pleasure.

original: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bdag nyid dong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bdag nyid dong ngo //
translated: She went to where the Blessed One was.

original: dong nas kyang /
analyzed: dong nas kyang /
translated: Having arrived,

original: dga' ba dang / gus pas chu'i rgyun de dag las chu blangs te //
analyzed: dga' ba dang / gus pas chu'i rgyun de dag las chu blangs te //
translated: with joy and respect she took water from those streams

original: bdag nyid la mngon par gtor zhing gdong yang 'khru bar byed do //
analyzed: bdag nyid la mngon par gtor zhing gdong yang 'khru bar byed do //
translated: and sprinkled it on herself and washed her face.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo goo ta m'i la byams pa'i thugs kyis khyab par mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye dgu'i bdag mo goo ta m'i la byams pa'i thugs kyis khyab par mdzad do //
translated: The Blessed One, too, pervaded the womb of Gautamī with his loving-kindness.

original: de chu'i rgyun de dag gis reg pas de'i lus bde bar gsal bar gyur to //
analyzed: de chu'i rgyun de dag gis reg pas de'i lus bde bar gsal bar gyur to //
translated: When she was touched by those streams of water, her body became clear and blissful.

original: rab rib de dag bral zhing mig kyang snga ma bzhin du rnam par dag par gyur cing de nas ches mchog tu gyur to //
analyzed: rab rib de dag bral zhing mig kyang snga ma bzhin du rnam par dag par gyur cing de nas ches mchog tu gyur to //
translated: Her cataracts were removed, and her eyes became pure, just as they had been before, and even better.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la gsang ba mi mnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la gsang ba mi mnga'o //
translated: The Tathāgata does not keep anything secret when he teaches the Dharma.

original: snod du ma gyur pa ni ma gtogs te /
analyzed: snod du ma gyur pa ni ma gtogs te /
translated: Except for those who are not fit vessels,

original: sems can dman pa dag la ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can dman pa dag la ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because inferior beings do not understand things as they are.🔽Therefore, Śāradvatīputra, you should teach and illuminate this kind of discourse of the Tathāgata extensively to the four assemblies.

original: sha ra dva ti'i bu de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu'i ngo bo 'di 'khor bzhi la rgyas par ston cing yang dag par rab tu gsal bar gyis shig / sha ra dva ti'i bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
analyzed: sha ra dva ti'i bu de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu'i ngo bo 'di 'khor bzhi la rgyas par ston cing yang dag par rab tu gsal bar gyis shig / sha ra dva ti'i bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
translated: Śāradvatīputra, those who hear this Dharma discourse

original: nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob pa de dag ni bsod nams kyi @2b phung po gzhal du med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob pa de dag ni bsod nams kyi @2b phung po gzhal du med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who attain joy and supreme joy upon hearing this kind of essence of the Tathāgata's good teachings will possess an immeasurable heap of merit.

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa 'di lta bu'i ngo bo 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mi 'thob cing /
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa 'di lta bu'i ngo bo 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mi 'thob cing /
translated: Those who, upon hearing this kind of essence of the Tathāgata's good teachings, do not attain joy and supreme joy,

original: phyi nas ma dang bar nye bar ston pa de dag ni 'dir tshul khrims nyams pa'am /
analyzed: phyi nas ma dang bar nye bar ston pa de dag ni 'dir tshul khrims nyams pa'am /
translated: and later show indifference, they will here be of impaired morality,

original: lhag par rlom pa'am /
analyzed: lhag par rlom pa'am /
translated: or will be arrogant,

original: chos yongs su ma dag pa ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos yongs su ma dag pa ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: or will teach the Dharma without purity.

original: gling gzhi ni mnyan yod du ste /
analyzed: gling gzhi ni mnyan yod du ste /
translated: The foundation of the continent is Śrāvastī.

original: yang de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i drung du 'dul ba bshad pa dang / khyim pa rnams kyis gang la slob par 'gyur ba'i don 'di dge sbyong goo ta mas nyan thos rnams la bslab pa bcas mod kyi /
analyzed: yang de'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i drung du 'dul ba bshad pa dang / khyim pa rnams kyis gang la slob par 'gyur ba'i don 'di dge sbyong goo ta mas nyan thos rnams la bslab pa bcas mod kyi /
translated: Moreover, at that time the monks explained the Vinaya in the presence of householders, and the householders thought, The ascetic Gautama has indeed laid down training rules for his disciples,

original: de dag ni phyi nas bslab pa dag la mi slob cing /
analyzed: de dag ni phyi nas bslab pa dag la mi slob cing /
translated: but later they do not train in those training rules,

original: de bzhin du kho bo cag gi drung du 'dul ba 'chad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du kho bo cag gi drung du 'dul ba 'chad do //
translated: In the same way, they will say, We will explain the Vinaya in front of you!

original: zhes smod par byed gzhogs 'phyas byed kha zer bar byed do //
analyzed: zhes smod par byed gzhogs 'phyas byed kha zer bar byed do //
translated: They will criticize, slander, and speak ill of us.

original: dge slong rnams kyis smod par byed pa dang / gzhogs 'phyas byed pa dang / kha zer bar byed pa'i mi rnams la thos par byas pa nas /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis smod par byed pa dang / gzhogs 'phyas byed pa dang / kha zer bar byed pa'i mi rnams la thos par byas pa nas /
translated: The monks will hear the people criticizing, slandering, and speaking ill of them, and they will report it to the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa'i bar dang / der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa'i bar dang / der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the monks,

original: dge slong dag khyim pa rnams kyi drung du 'dul ba bshad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dag khyim pa rnams kyi drung du 'dul ba bshad par mi bya'o //
translated: Monks, the Vinaya should not be explained in front of householders.

original: gang 'chad pa la ni ltung ba nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang 'chad pa la ni ltung ba nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is explained, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gus pa dang bcas zhe sa dang bcas pas dge slong rnams ga la ba der dong bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gus pa dang bcas zhe sa dang bcas pas dge slong rnams ga la ba der dong bar gyur to //
translated: Then King Prasenajit of Kosala, with respect and deference, went to where the monks were.

original: dong nas kyang 'di skad du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos zab mo gang yin zhes smras pa dang / gang 'dul ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dong nas kyang 'di skad du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos zab mo gang yin zhes smras pa dang / gang 'dul ba zhes bya'o //
translated: They said, It is called the Vinaya.

original: 'phags pa rnams legs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams legs so //
translated: The king said, Excellent, noble ones!

original: kho bo cag gi mdun du shod cig / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi mdun du shod cig / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
translated: Please teach it in front of us.🔽The monks said, As the Bhagavan prohibited, we cannot teach the Vinaya in front of householders.

original: ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pa ltar khyim pa rnams kyi drung du 'dul ba bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pa ltar khyim pa rnams kyi drung du 'dul ba bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Bhagavan said to the monks, I allow it.

original: ngas gnang bar bya yis de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ngas gnang bar bya yis de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bya'o //
translated: You should teach it in front of such kings.

original: ji ltar dge slong rnams la gzhogs 'phyas su mi 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar dge slong rnams la gzhogs 'phyas su mi 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: You should teach it in such a way that it does not become a pretext for monks to quarrel.

original: drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sutra Requested by Ugra also says:

original: byang chub sems dpa' @3a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' @3a * //
translated: Bodhisattvas

original: khyim pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa la brten te /
analyzed: khyim pa 'dul ba 'dzin pa la brten te /
translated: who are householders should rely on those who uphold the Vinaya.

original: ltung ba 'dul ba dang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: ltung ba 'dul ba dang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la brtson par bya'o //
translated: One should strive to subdue the downfalls and to subdue the afflictions.

original: ma mo 'dzin pa la brten te /
analyzed: ma mo 'dzin pa la brten te /
translated: Relying on the mother,

original: lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid sdom pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: one should strive to restrain body, speech, and mind.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Great Parinirvāṇa Sūtra also says,

original: 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: “The unconditioned Saṅgha is the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsang ba'i chos bstan pa ga la yod /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsang ba'i chos bstan pa ga la yod /
translated: How could the Tathāgata teach the Dharma of secrets?

original: gsang ba gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsags pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsags pa'o //
translated: What is secret is accumulated.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun 'dus ma byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ga las 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun 'dus ma byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ga las 'gyur zhe na /
translated: From where does the unconditioned Tathāgata Saṅgha of the Tathāgata come?

original: gsang ba'i chos bstan pa las te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i chos bstan pa las te /
translated: It comes from teaching the Dharma of secrets.

original: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa gang gsang ba ni dam tshig dang bsags pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa gang gsang ba ni dam tshig dang bsags pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: What is secret, which should not be transgressed, is the vow and the accumulation.”

original: rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i sbyin pa bstan pa la /
analyzed: rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i sbyin pa bstan pa la /
translated: With regard to the generosity of those who have gone forth,

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am /
translated: it is said that those who have gone forth in the Śrāvaka Vehicle

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba ji ltar dad pas sbyin par bya ba za bar 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba ji ltar dad pas sbyin par bya ba za bar 'gyur /
translated: How can a bodhisattva who is a vehicle practitioner eat the food that is given out of faith?

original: gang chud za bar mi 'gyur bar ro //
analyzed: gang chud za bar mi 'gyur bar ro //
translated: He should eat it in such a way that it is not wasted.

original: ji ltar yongs su gtong /
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su gtong /
translated: How should he give it away?

original: de yang gang chud za bar mi 'gyur bar ro //
analyzed: de yang gang chud za bar mi 'gyur bar ro //
translated: He should give it away in such a way that it is not wasted.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
translated: The Bodhisattvabhumi also says,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bslab pa las 'das na ji ltar yang sbyin pa mi gtong ngo zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bslab pa las 'das na ji ltar yang sbyin pa mi gtong ngo zhes gsungs so //
translated: “The bodhisattvas who abide in the teaching of the Bhagavat Buddhas do not give gifts at all if they transgress the precepts.”

original: byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Maitresigarbharaja Sutra also says,

original: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: “Then the youthful Manjusri said to the Bhagavat,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dad pas sbyin pa gnang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dad pas sbyin pa gnang /
translated: ‘Bhagavat, how do you give gifts out of faith?’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavat said,

original: 'jam dpal sbyor ba dang grol ba la ngas dad pas sbyin pa gnang ngo zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal sbyor ba dang grol ba la ngas dad pas sbyin pa gnang ngo zhes gsungs so //
translated: ‘Manjusri, I give gifts out of faith in the union and liberation.’

original: tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra Requested by Brahmadatta says:

original: mi sbyor ba la'ang rtag tu 'gal 'gyur te //
analyzed: mi sbyor ba la'ang rtag tu 'gal 'gyur te //
translated: They are always in conflict with those who do not engage in it.

original: ji ltar rgya mtsho che dang ro bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rgya mtsho che dang ro bzhin no //
translated: They are like the ocean and a drop of spit.

original: ji ltar skye bo bya dang 'phrad pa bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar skye bo bya dang 'phrad pa bzhin //
translated: They are like people who encounter birds.

original: de ni mkhas pa rnams dang shin tu ring //
analyzed: de ni mkhas pa rnams dang shin tu ring //
translated: They are very far from the wise.

original: dad med de ni 'khrul pa tshol bar byed //
analyzed: dad med de ni 'khrul pa tshol bar byed //
translated: Those without faith seek out mistakes.

original: bre mo gtam smra'i spyod yul tshogs la dga' //
analyzed: bre mo gtam smra'i spyod yul tshogs la dga' //
translated: They enjoy the company of those who speak nonsense.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la ma gus 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la ma gus 'gyur //
translated: They have no respect for the teachings of the Victorious Ones.

original: 'di nas shi 'phos myur du ngan 'gror 'gro //
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos myur du ngan 'gror 'gro //
translated: After they die, they quickly go to the lower realms.

original: @3b mi sbyor ba la dran med shes rab med //
analyzed: @3b mi sbyor ba la dran med shes rab med //
translated: Those who do not engage in it have no mindfulness and no wisdom.

original: mya ngan mi 'da' mi 'grol tshul khrims med //🔽de ni dmus long lam dang ring ba bzhin //
analyzed: mya ngan mi 'da' mi 'grol tshul khrims med // de ni dmus long lam dang ring ba bzhin //
translated: They do not transcend suffering and are not liberated; they have no ethical discipline.🔽They are like the blind far from the road.

original: 'phags pa'i lam dang shin tu ring bas ring //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam dang shin tu ring bas ring //
translated: They are far from the noble path.

original: gang zag mi sbyor de ni smra ba mang //
analyzed: gang zag mi sbyor de ni smra ba mang //
translated: Those individuals who do not engage in it are talkative.

original: rgod la dga' zhing rtag tu dbang po g-yengs //
analyzed: rgod la dga' zhing rtag tu dbang po g-yengs //
translated: They enjoy agitation and are always distracted.

original: de ni bstan la chu ra'i chu bos min //
analyzed: de ni bstan la chu ra'i chu bos min //
translated: They are not in the Buddha’s teachings for long.

original: de ni grong zas lcags kyi thu lum za //
analyzed: de ni grong zas lcags kyi thu lum za //
translated: They will eat iron balls for food in the village.

original: sbyin pa po yis dad pas byin pa ni //
analyzed: sbyin pa po yis dad pas byin pa ni //
translated: The faithful offerings of donors

original: sbyor dang grol la nga yis gnang ba yin //
analyzed: sbyor dang grol la nga yis gnang ba yin //
translated: I have allowed for those who are in training and for those who are free of training.

original: mi sbyor bas ni kham gcig zos na yang //
analyzed: mi sbyor bas ni kham gcig zos na yang //
translated: But if someone who is not in training eats even a single mouthful without having prepared it,

original: ngo lon ri rab tsam yang bya ba yin //🔽sbyor ba gang yin rnams kyang 'di la 'dzem /
analyzed: ngo lon ri rab tsam yang bya ba yin // sbyor ba gang yin rnams kyang 'di la 'dzem /
translated: he must make amends for it, even if it is only the size of Mount Meru.

original: mi sbyor de yis rgod cing zos na ni //
analyzed: mi sbyor de yis rgod cing zos na ni //
translated: He should avoid any preparations. If he eats carelessly,

original: glang chen ba lang rta bong mngal du skye //🔽de dag de zos brnyas pa'i gzugs su 'gyur //
analyzed: glang chen ba lang rta bong mngal du skye // de dag de zos brnyas pa'i gzugs su 'gyur //
translated: he will be reborn in the womb of an elephant, a bull, a horse, or a donkey.

original: de dag mdog ngan nyam chung smad par 'gyur //🔽zas blangs zos pa mi gtsang dri ngar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag mdog ngan nyam chung smad par 'gyur // zas blangs zos pa mi gtsang dri ngar 'gyur //
translated: He will be born ugly, weak, and despised,🔽and his food will be foul-smelling and impure.

original: de dag dbyug pas bsnun pas sbyong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag dbyug pas bsnun pas sbyong bar 'gyur //
translated: He will be beaten with sticks and will be purified.

original: sems kyang g-yeng zhing dran pa rnam par nyams //
analyzed: sems kyang g-yeng zhing dran pa rnam par nyams //
translated: His mind will be distracted and his mindfulness will be lost.

original: slong mo byed cing smyon pa dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: slong mo byed cing smyon pa dag tu 'gyur //
translated: He will go begging and will become insane.

original: bstan pa bsod nams stegs 'di thob nas kyang //
analyzed: bstan pa bsod nams stegs 'di thob nas kyang //
translated: Having obtained this teaching, which is a bridge to merit,

original: bag med gyur te ngan 'gror lhung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bag med gyur te ngan 'gror lhung bar 'gyur //
translated: he will become heedless and fall into the lower realms.

original: lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas par //
analyzed: lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas par //
translated: For countless millions of eons

original: ngan song sdug bsngal mang po des myong nas //
analyzed: ngan song sdug bsngal mang po des myong nas //
translated: they experience the many sufferings of the lower realms.

original: mi khom mi yi 'jig rten slar thob nas //
analyzed: mi khom mi yi 'jig rten slar thob nas //
translated: Having again attained a human world without leisure,

original: sdig byas phyir yang ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig byas phyir yang ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur //
translated: because of their evil deeds they will fall again into the lower realms.

original: lcags kyi thu lum rgya mtsho chen po yi //
analyzed: lcags kyi thu lum rgya mtsho chen po yi //
translated: If an iron ball were to fall into the great ocean,

original: nang du ltung bar gyur na gnas med de //
analyzed: nang du ltung bar gyur na gnas med de //
translated: it would have no place to rest.

original: lo ni bye ba phrag stong snyed du yang //
analyzed: lo ni bye ba phrag stong snyed du yang //
translated: Even in thousands of millions of eons

original: rgya mtsho che las slar yang dbyung mi nus //
analyzed: rgya mtsho che las slar yang dbyung mi nus //
translated: it could not rise again from the great ocean.

original: de bzhin byis pa ngan 'gror ltung ba yang //
analyzed: de bzhin byis pa ngan 'gror ltung ba yang //
translated: In the same way, when the foolish fall into the lower realms,

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya snyed du //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya snyed du //
translated: for many hundreds of thousands of millions of eons

original: de dag mir skye ba yang the tshom za //
analyzed: de dag mir skye ba yang the tshom za //
translated: they will doubt that they will be born as humans again,

original: de dag mtho ris byang chub ga la thob //
analyzed: de dag mtho ris byang chub ga la thob //
translated: so how will they attain enlightenment in the higher realms?🔽Those whose thoughts are pure, who strive for enlightenment,🔽who are well restrained, who are without deceit or guile,

original: bsam pa dag cing byang chub brtson pa dang // legs par bsdams shing g-yo sgyu med pa dang // mnyam pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: bsam pa dag cing byang chub brtson pa dang // legs par bsdams shing g-yo sgyu med pa dang // mnyam pa'i sems kyis byang chub thob 'gyur te //
translated: who have an attitude of equality will attain enlightenment,

original: de dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dka' ba med //
analyzed: de dag thams cad mkhyen nyid dka' ba med //
translated: and for them omniscience will not be difficult.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: zas phyi phung po spyod pa'i tshul las kyang /
analyzed: zas phyi phung po spyod pa'i tshul las kyang /
translated: Also, in the Chapter on the Conduct of the Great Collection of Food,

original: khyod kyi zas gtong ba la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyi zas gtong ba la bslab par bya'o //
translated: it says, “You should train in giving away your food.”

original: dge slong gis bza' ba lnga blangs nas ma 'bags par sbyin par bya sbyin par byed pas 'ga' zhig @4a * //
analyzed: dge slong gis bza' ba lnga blangs nas ma 'bags par sbyin par bya sbyin par byed pas 'ga' zhig @4a * //
translated: A monk should take five mouthfuls of food and give them to someone else without being attached.

original: la sbyin par bya ste /
analyzed: la sbyin par bya ste /
translated: If he gives them to someone,

original: pha dang ma la sbyin par bya /
analyzed: pha dang ma la sbyin par bya /
translated: he should give them to his father or mother.

original: khyim pa nad pa skyed mos tshal na 'dug pa la sbyin par bya /
analyzed: khyim pa nad pa skyed mos tshal na 'dug pa la sbyin par bya /
translated: He should give them to a householder who is sick and staying in a pleasure grove.

original: las byed pa la sbyin par bya /🔽phan 'dogs pa la sbyin par bya /
analyzed: las byed pa la sbyin par bya / phan 'dogs pa la sbyin par bya /
translated: He should give them to someone who is working.🔽He should give them to someone who is helping him.

original: 'ching bas bcings pa la sbyin par bya /
analyzed: 'ching bas bcings pa la sbyin par bya /
translated: He should give them to someone who is bound in chains.

original: bud med sbrum ma 'ongs pa gal te re ba na dran pa nye bar gzhag ste sbyin par bya /
analyzed: bud med sbrum ma 'ongs pa gal te re ba na dran pa nye bar gzhag ste sbyin par bya /
translated: If a pregnant woman comes and asks for them, he should give them to her, but only after he has established mindfulness.

original: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: He should give them to someone who wants to go forth.

original: ster ba na dad pas sbyin pa la chud zos pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ster ba na dad pas sbyin pa la chud zos pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: When he gives them away, there is no waste of the offerings made out of faith.

original: ji skad du dad pas byin pa chud za ba las /
analyzed: ji skad du dad pas byin pa chud za ba las /
translated: As it is said, “There is no waste of offerings made out of faith.”

original: yang de dag du zhig ce na /
analyzed: yang de dag du zhig ce na /
translated: How many are there?

original: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin pa tshul khrims 'chal ba la sbyin na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar brjod par bya'o //🔽yang dag par lta ba la byin pa log par lta ba la sbyin na dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin pa tshul khrims 'chal ba la sbyin na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar brjod par bya'o // yang dag par lta ba la byin pa log par lta ba la sbyin na dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one gives to those with moral discipline what was given to those with faulty moral discipline, it is said that the gift of faith is wasted.🔽If one gives to those with wrong views what was given to those with right views, the gift of faith is wasted.

original: yang dag par zhugs pa la byin pa log par zhugs pa la sbyin na dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: yang dag par zhugs pa la byin pa log par zhugs pa la sbyin na dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: If one gives to those with wrong practice what was given to those with right practice, the gift of faith is wasted.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas sbyin pa pha dang ma la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas sbyin pa pha dang ma la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One said, “Give with faith to your father and mother.

original: gang dag 'byor pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag la ni chos kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya /
analyzed: gang dag 'byor pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag la ni chos kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya /
translated: Give with the Dharma to those who are wealthy.

original: gang dag sdug bsngal ba nyid du 'gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par bya zhing gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gnas ngag la yang dag par gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gang dag sdug bsngal ba nyid du 'gyur pa de dag la ni sbyin par bya zhing gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gnas ngag la yang dag par gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Give to those who are suffering, and lead them to go for refuge to the Three Jewels and to take up the precepts.”

original: tshul khrims dang thos pa dang bsam gtan te /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang thos pa dang bsam gtan te /
translated: He does not exert himself in the three things: morality, learning, and concentration.

original: gnas gsum po dag la mngon par mi brtson par za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas gsum po dag la mngon par mi brtson par za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If he eats, he squanders the offerings of the faithful.

original: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyi thad nas dad pas sbyin pa blangs te zang zing cung zad kyi phyir gzhan dag la rjes su byin na /
analyzed: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyi thad nas dad pas sbyin pa blangs te zang zing cung zad kyi phyir gzhan dag la rjes su byin na /
translated: He takes offerings from the faithful brahmins and householders, and then gives them away to others for the sake of a little material reward.

original: dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //🔽mi bkres par za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro // mi bkres par za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If he does this, he squanders the offerings of the faithful.🔽He eats without being hungry.🔽If he eats, he squanders the offerings of the faithful.

original: tshod shes pa med par za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshod shes pa med par za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He eats without knowing moderation.🔽If he eats, he squanders the offerings of the faithful.

original: de ji tsam gyis chog par 'gyur bzhin du de las lhag par kham gcig kyang za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji tsam gyis chog par 'gyur bzhin du de las lhag par kham gcig kyang za na dad pas sbyin pa chud za bar 'gyur te /
translated: He eats more than he should, even a single bite.

original: de'i phyir khyod kyis chud mi za bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyis chud mi za bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, you should not squander it.

original: rnal 'byor spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang /
analyzed: rnal 'byor spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang /
translated: The Bodhisattvabhumi also says,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par slong ba po gang zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par slong ba po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bodhisattva’s true recipient?

original: sdug bsngal can nyid dang mgon med pa dang 'jungs pa @4b dang / rten med pa rnams ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal can nyid dang mgon med pa dang 'jungs pa @4b dang / rten med pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who are suffering, those who are helpless, those who are stingy, and those who have no support.

original: gang la sbyin pa btang ba byang chub sems dpa'i zhing ngo zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gang la sbyin pa btang ba byang chub sems dpa'i zhing ngo zhes gsungs so //
translated: Those who give to them are the bodhisattva’s field of giving.

original: dkon mchog sprin las kyang /
analyzed: dkon mchog sprin las kyang /
translated: The Cloud of Jewels says,

original: bsod snyoms pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: “The alms-beggar should think,

original: cha gcig tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: cha gcig tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gzhag par bya'o //
translated: ‘I will set aside one part for my companions in the celibate life.

original: gnyis pa ni sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la'o //
translated: I will give a second part to those sentient beings who are suffering.

original: gsum pa ni sems can log par ltung ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni sems can log par ltung ba rnams la'o //
translated: I will give a third part to those sentient beings who have fallen into an unfortunate rebirth.

original: bzhi pa ni bdag nyid kyis bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni bdag nyid kyis bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: I will consume a fourth part myself.’🔽”

original: 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las kyang /
analyzed: 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra on the Application of Mindfulness to the Holy Dharma says,

original: dge slong dgon pa pa'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: dge slong dgon pa pa'i dbang du byas te /
translated: “The monk who lives in the wilderness should think,

original: cha gcig grong khyer thams cad kyi dbul po la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: cha gcig grong khyer thams cad kyi dbul po la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: ‘I will give one part to the poor of all the towns.

original: gnyis pa ni dgon pa na gnas pa'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams la sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni dgon pa na gnas pa'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams la sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: The second is to give to animals who live in monasteries.

original: bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra on the Aspects of the Truths also says:

original: gang yang sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba /
analyzed: gang yang sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba /
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattvas who have gone forth from the home life

original: byang chub kyi yan lag la mngon par brtson pa des ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bya /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag la mngon par brtson pa des ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bya /
translated: and are striving for the factors for enlightenment should give gifts.

original: ci zhig sbyin pa sbyin par bya /
analyzed: ci zhig sbyin pa sbyin par bya /
translated: What should they give?

original: sbyin pa'i ngo bo ji tsam zhig sbyin par bya zhe na /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i ngo bo ji tsam zhig sbyin par bya zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of the gifts they should give?

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba /
translated: Śāriputra, bodhisattvas who have gone forth from the home life

original: byang chub kyi yan lag la mngon par brtson pa des so sor thar pa'i sdom bas yang dag par bsdam par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag la mngon par brtson pa des so sor thar pa'i sdom bas yang dag par bsdam par bya'o //
translated: and are striving for the factors for enlightenment should be restrained by the restraint of the prātimokṣa.

original: chog dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par bya /
analyzed: chog dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par bya /
translated: They should be content and perfect in their conduct.

original: kha na mtho ba rdul phran tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang / yang dag par blangs nas bslab pa la bslab par bya'o //🔽des bstan pa la bla mar bya /
analyzed: kha na mtho ba rdul phran tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang / yang dag par blangs nas bslab pa la bslab par bya'o // des bstan pa la bla mar bya /
translated: Having taken it up, he should train in the precepts.🔽He should respect the teachings.

original: kha ton la bla mar bya /
analyzed: kha ton la bla mar bya /
translated: He should respect the recitation.

original: tshul khrims la bla mar bya /
analyzed: tshul khrims la bla mar bya /
translated: He should respect the precepts.

original: dgon par gnas pa la bla mar bya'o //
analyzed: dgon par gnas pa la bla mar bya'o //
translated: He should respect the wilderness dwelling.

original: chos ji skad thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa rnams rgyas par gzhan dag la bstan par bya /🔽chos sbyin pa por 'gyur bar bya /
analyzed: chos ji skad thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa rnams rgyas par gzhan dag la bstan par bya / chos sbyin pa por 'gyur bar bya /
translated: He should teach others the Dharma as he has heard it and as he has understood it.🔽He should be a giver of the gift of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi sbyin bdag tu bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin bdag tu bya'o //
translated: He should be a master of the gift of the Dharma.

original: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste /
translated: “Śāriputra, a lay bodhisattva might fill buddhafields as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river with the seven precious substances

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @5a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @5a * //
translated: and give them as gifts to the tathāgatas, the saints, the perfectly awakened ones.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed la /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed la /
translated: They give gifts to the perfect buddhas.

original: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ston par byed na /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig ston par byed na /
translated: But if an ordained bodhisattva were to teach just one verse of four lines,

original: 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
analyzed: 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
translated: this would create even more merit than that.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas /
translated: Śāriputra, the Tathāgata

original: rab tu byung ba la ni zang zing gi sbyin pa ma gnang ngo //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba la ni zang zing gi sbyin pa ma gnang ngo //
translated: does not allow material gifts to the ordained.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu rab tu byung bar gyur pas rim gro dang bcas pas bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du med par khyim pa'am /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu rab tu byung bar gyur pas rim gro dang bcas pas bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du med par khyim pa'am /
translated: Śāriputra, the ordained should not accept invitations to receive Dharma robes and alms from householders or the ordained for even inconceivable, immeasurable eons, with all manner of honors.

original: rab tu byung ba la chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyis mgron du gnyer pa ma gnang ste /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba la chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyis mgron du gnyer pa ma gnang ste /
translated: The ordained should not accept invitations to receive Dharma robes and alms from householders or the ordained.

original: chos nyid la gus pa dang bla ma dang ri mor byas nas nye bar bsten te gnas pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: chos nyid la gus pa dang bla ma dang ri mor byas nas nye bar bsten te gnas pa ma gtogs so //
translated: They should rely on and live with respect for the Dharma itself, and with respect for and devotion to their gurus.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu nga'i nyan thos rnams ni chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed kyi /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu nga'i nyan thos rnams ni chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed kyi /
translated: Śāriputra, my śrāvakas give the gift of Dharma.

original: zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: They do not give the gift of material things.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang gi rnyed pa lhung bzed du lhung zhing lhung bzed du chud pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyis rnyed pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang gi rnyed pa lhung bzed du lhung zhing lhung bzed du chud pa chos dang ldan pa chos kyis rnyed pa /
translated: Śāriputra, whatever is gained by falling into the begging bowl, falling into the begging bowl and falling into the Dharma,

original: des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong du bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong du bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: that should be eaten in common with those who practice pure conduct.

original: nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra of the Essence of the Sun also says:

original: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kondi n+ya la bka' stsal pa /
translated: There the Blessed One said to the Venerable Ājñātakauṇḍinya:

original: koondi n+ya sems can rnams kyis rang slu ba la ltos /
analyzed: koondi n+ya sems can rnams kyis rang slu ba la ltos /
translated: “Kauṇḍinya, look how sentient beings deceive themselves.

original: sems can dbul ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: sems can dbul ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis /
translated: Sentient beings who are afraid of the danger of poverty

original: chos la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos la gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to benefit monks who abide by the Dharma

original: rang gi yo byad kyi dngos po sna tshogs pa gang dag phul ba las /
analyzed: rang gi yo byad kyi dngos po sna tshogs pa gang dag phul ba las /
translated: offer various personal belongings.

original: la la ni rang nyid kyis yongs su spyad /🔽la la ni yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir gzhan dag la byin /
analyzed: la la ni rang nyid kyis yongs su spyad / la la ni yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir gzhan dag la byin /
translated: Some of them they used themselves,🔽and some of them they gave to others to use.

original: la la ni nan gyis phrogs shing yongs su spyad la /
analyzed: la la ni nan gyis phrogs shing yongs su spyad la /
translated: Some of them they took by force and used,

original: de ltar ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal bsten to //
analyzed: de ltar ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal bsten to //
translated: and thus they experienced suffering in the three lower realms.🔽“Again, those who were afraid of the terrors of poverty,

original: yang sems can dbul ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa gang dag 'khor ba'i btson ra thams cad las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang sems can dbul ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa gang dag 'khor ba'i btson ra thams cad las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to be completely liberated from the prison of saṃsāra,

original: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
analyzed: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
translated: went forth in the teachings of the bhagavān buddhas of the past.

original: de ltar rab tu byung ma thag tu /
analyzed: de ltar rab tu byung ma thag tu /
translated: As soon as they had gone forth,

original: rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dor zhing chos dang ldan pa'i kha ton dor nas /
analyzed: rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dor zhing chos dang ldan pa'i kha ton dor nas /
translated: they abandoned the practice of yoga, abandoned the practice of reciting the Dharma,🔽and offered various things to the bhikṣus who were established in the Dharma.

original: chos la gnas pa'i dge slong @5b rnams la dngos po sna tshogs pa phul ba de dag / kha cig gis ni rang gis yongs su spyad /
analyzed: chos la gnas pa'i dge slong @5b rnams la dngos po sna tshogs pa phul ba de dag / kha cig gis ni rang gis yongs su spyad /
translated: Some of them they used themselves,

original: kha cig gis ni khyim na gnas pa rnams la byin te /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni khyim na gnas pa rnams la byin te /
translated: and some of them they gave to householders.

original: de gnyis ka ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyis bcom par gyur to //
analyzed: de gnyis ka ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyis bcom par gyur to //
translated: Both of them were destroyed by the sufferings of the lower realms.

original: nyes dmigs 'di gzigs pas na bdag gis nyan thos rnams la dran pa bskyed pa'i phyir rab tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: nyes dmigs 'di gzigs pas na bdag gis nyan thos rnams la dran pa bskyed pa'i phyir rab tu bstan par bya'o //
translated: Seeing this danger, I will teach the Listeners so that they may develop mindfulness.

original: nga'i nyan thos sus kyang dge slong la phul ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang bcud khyim na gnas pa rnams la sbyin par mi bya zhing /
analyzed: nga'i nyan thos sus kyang dge slong la phul ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang bcud khyim na gnas pa rnams la sbyin par mi bya zhing /
translated: My Listeners should not give to householders any flowers, fruits, leaves, or juices that have been offered to a monk or to the community of monks.

original: yang gang zag gi 'du shes kyis kyang yongs su spyad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang gang zag gi 'du shes kyis kyang yongs su spyad par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not use them with the perception of a person.

original: dge slong gzhan la nyo tshong mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gzhan la nyo tshong mi bya'o //
translated: Monks should not trade with one another.

original: sems can gyis zang zing yongs su bzung ba'i rkyen bsgyur bzlog dang gser sgrub pas ngan song gi sdug bsngal du ltung bar mi bya'i chos kyi bsdu bas sems can rnams bsdu par bya /
analyzed: sems can gyis zang zing yongs su bzung ba'i rkyen bsgyur bzlog dang gser sgrub pas ngan song gi sdug bsngal du ltung bar mi bya'i chos kyi bsdu bas sems can rnams bsdu par bya /
translated: They should not cause sentient beings to fall into the sufferings of the lower realms by engaging in the exchange of goods, the exchange of services, or the exchange of gold. Instead, they should gather sentient beings through the Dharma.

original: mi phyed pa'i dad pa bzhi dang theg pa gsum dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la rnam par gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i dad pa bzhi dang theg pa gsum dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la rnam par gnas par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: One should abide in the four kinds of unwavering faith, the three vehicles, and the three doors of liberation.

original: drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Vimaladatta Sūtra also says,

original: khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa rab tu byung ba la gzhol bar bya'o //
translated: “Householder, thus the householder bodhisattva should be devoted to the renunciant.

original: des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: des 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste /
translated: He should arouse his mind in this way:

original: gal te bdag gis nyi ma gcig la mchod sbyin gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang sbyin par byed /
analyzed: gal te bdag gis nyi ma gcig la mchod sbyin gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang sbyin par byed /
translated: ‘If I were to give as many sacrifices as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River every day,

original: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar byed na /
analyzed: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar byed na /
translated: and were to give away all my possessions,

original: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni /
analyzed: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni /
translated: giving away all my possessions

original: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba'i sems kyi zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu byung ba'i sems kyi zil gyis gnon to //
translated: would be outshone by the thought of going forth in the well-taught Dharma and Vinaya.

original: bdag gis sbyin pa la snying por dga' bar rig par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sbyin pa la snying por dga' bar rig par mi bya'o //
translated: I should not take delight in the essence of giving.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyim bdag sbyin pa ni dman te /
analyzed: khyim bdag sbyin pa ni dman te /
translated: Householder, giving is inferior.

original: ci dad pa med pa dang byas pa mi shes pa dang / chom rkun pa dang gdol pa dang / rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / blon po rnams kyang sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed dam /
analyzed: ci dad pa med pa dang byas pa mi shes pa dang / chom rkun pa dang gdol pa dang / rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / blon po rnams kyang sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed dam /
translated: thieves, outcastes, those appointed by the king, and ministers not to give gifts?

original: khyim bdag yang bdag gis sbyin pa la snying por dga' bar rig par mi bya'i bdag gis tshul khrims dang thos pa la snying po can du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: khyim bdag yang bdag gis sbyin pa la snying por dga' bar rig par mi bya'i bdag gis tshul khrims dang thos pa la snying po can du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Householder, you should not think that you enjoy the essence of generosity. You should think that you enjoy the essence of morality and learning.

original: byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: byams pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Maitreya-simhanada Sutra also says,

original: byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma @6a * //
analyzed: byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma @6a * //
translated: Maitreya, in the future, in the last five hundred years,

original: la ; dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa /
analyzed: la ; dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa /
translated: there will be some monks who have not cultivated their bodies,

original: sems ma bsgoms pa /
analyzed: sems ma bsgoms pa /
translated: who have not cultivated their minds,

original: tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa /
translated: who have not cultivated morality,

original: shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: and who have not cultivated wisdom.

original: de dag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi ched du /
analyzed: de dag ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi ched du /
translated: For the sake of robes and alms,🔽they will deceive the world with their false holiness.

original: me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas pa la lan du byas pa'i skyes dag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: me tog gi skyes dag dang / 'bras bu'i skyes dag dang / lo ma'i skyes dag dang / yo byad kyi skyes dag dang / byas pa la lan du byas pa'i skyes dag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur bas /
translated: They go to the houses of the faithful with gifts of flowers, gifts of fruit, gifts of leaves, gifts of necessities, and gifts of gratitude.

original: byams pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng brgyud lta bu mi bya zhing /
analyzed: byams pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng brgyud lta bu mi bya zhing /
translated: Maitreya, a monk should not be like a garland maker.

original: bran dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: bran dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o //
translated: He should not be like a servant or a slave.

original: byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni /
analyzed: byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni /
translated: Maitreya, a monk who wishes to go to the houses of the faithful

original: chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya ba ma gtogs par /
analyzed: chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya ba ma gtogs par /
translated: should go there with the gift of the Dharma,

original: skyes gzhan bskur bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: skyes gzhan bskur bar mi bya ste /
translated: and not with other gifts.

original: des ni mang du thos pa dang / gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang ; kha gsag med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing /
analyzed: des ni mang du thos pa dang / gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / brkam chags med pa dang / tshul 'chos pa med pa dang ; kha gsag med pa dang / bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing /
translated: He should be learned, well-versed in the scriptures, fearless, free from greed, free from hypocrisy, free from flattery, and free from self-importance.

original: chos la dga' ba bskyed nas /
analyzed: chos la dga' ba bskyed nas /
translated: He should arouse joy in the Dharma

original: khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: and then go to the houses of the faithful.

original: khyim rnams su song nas kyang /
analyzed: khyim rnams su song nas kyang /
translated: And having gone to the houses,

original: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing /
translated: they should speak in praise of the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha, and they should speak in praise of generosity, moral discipline, patience, perseverance, meditative concentration, and wisdom.

original: chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par khang khyim gyi ched dam /
analyzed: chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par khang khyim gyi ched dam /
translated: Except for the topic of the Dharma, they should not speak about🔽houses,

original: zhing las kyi ched dam /
analyzed: zhing las kyi ched dam /
translated: fields,

original: rnyed pa'i ched dam /
analyzed: rnyed pa'i ched dam /
translated: wealth,

original: rig pa bde ba'i ched dam /
analyzed: rig pa bde ba'i ched dam /
translated: knowledge,

original: rgyal po'i gtam mam /
analyzed: rgyal po'i gtam mam /
translated: the king,

original: chom rkun gyi gtam mam /
analyzed: chom rkun gyi gtam mam /
translated: thieves,🔽villages,

original: grong gi gtam mam /🔽grong khyer gyi gtam mam /
analyzed: grong gi gtam mam / grong khyer gyi gtam mam /
translated: towns,

original: ljongs kyi gtam mam /
analyzed: ljongs kyi gtam mam /
translated: regions,

original: bu pho'i gtam mam /
analyzed: bu pho'i gtam mam /
translated: sons,

original: bu mo'i gtam mam /
analyzed: bu mo'i gtam mam /
translated: daughters,

original: gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o //
analyzed: gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o //
translated: or any other topics.

original: byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste /
analyzed: byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste /
translated: “With what love would you fill this world system of a billion worlds with the seven kinds of precious substances,

original: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang yang bde ba'i yo byad yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar bsdus nas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang yang bde ba'i yo byad yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar bsdus nas /
translated: If, noble son or daughter, you were to give to that noble son or daughter all the articles of happiness that exist in the great trichiliocosm,

original: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la byin na /
translated: having gathered them all together,

original: @6b nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni /🔽des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la /
analyzed: @6b nor gyi phung po de tsam dang / bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni / des rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la /
translated: that heap of wealth and those articles of happiness would not be a loving

original: snying brtse ba 'am /🔽phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: snying brtse ba 'am / phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: kindness or a favor to that noble son or daughter.

original: des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bshad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste /
analyzed: des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bshad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste /
translated: But if you were to cause that noble son or daughter to listen to just one four-line verse,

original: de yang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par drangs shing /
analyzed: de yang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par drangs shing /
translated: and that verse were to be heard by his or her ear-consciousness,🔽and that noble son or daughter were to attain faith,

original: thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi re zhig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang /
analyzed: thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi re zhig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang /
translated: even if only for a moment,

original: de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rgyas pa dang phan 'dogs pa dang / snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: That son of a good family or daughter of a good family will be doing a great deal to promote, to help, and to have compassion for that son of a good family or daughter of a good family.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sde snod kyi mdo las kyang /🔽sh'a ri'i bu bkres pas rang gi brla'i sha'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sde snod kyi mdo las kyang / sh'a ri'i bu bkres pas rang gi brla'i sha'am /
translated: And in the Buddhapiṭaka Sūtra it says,

original: dpung pa'i sha zos pa ni bla'i /
analyzed: dpung pa'i sha zos pa ni bla'i /
translated: Śāriputra, it is better to eat the flesh of one’s own thighs

original: nyes dmigs su mi lta ba dang / 'byung bar mi shes pas /
analyzed: nyes dmigs su mi lta ba dang / 'byung bar mi shes pas /
translated: than to use the offerings of the faithful without seeing the drawbacks and not knowing what to avoid.

original: dad pas sbyin pa la longs spyod par byed pa ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: dad pas sbyin pa la longs spyod par byed pa ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: It is not like that for those who use the offerings of the faithful with faith.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a ri'i bu ngas sbyor ba rnams dang grol ba rnams la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu ngas sbyor ba rnams dang grol ba rnams la dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ste /
translated: Śāriputra, I allow the use of the offerings of the faithful by those who are engaged and those who are liberated,

original: de dag las gzhan pa la ni ma yin no //🔽sh'a ri'i bu ji tsam zhig gis sbyor ba yin /
analyzed: de dag las gzhan pa la ni ma yin no // sh'a ri'i bu ji tsam zhig gis sbyor ba yin /
translated: but not by others.

original: ji tsam zhig gis grol ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji tsam zhig gis grol ba yin zhe na /
translated: Śāriputra, what is it to be engaged? What is it to be liberated?

original: gang mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam na /
analyzed: gang mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam na /
translated: I will attain final Nirvaṇa without clinging in this very life.

original: de lta bu ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni sbyor ba yin no //
translated: Such is the application.

original: mi dge ba'i chos spang ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i chos mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir spong ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam goms par bya ba la mgo 'am /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos spang ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i chos mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir spong ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam goms par bya ba la mgo 'am /
translated: In order to abandon unwholesome dharmas and manifest wholesome dharmas, he should be like one whose head or clothes are on fire,

original: gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pa de lta bu ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: gos la me 'bar ba lta bur byed pa de lta bu ni sbyor ba yin no //
translated: striving to extinguish the flames. Such is the application.

original: chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam du mos nas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam du mos nas /
translated: Contemplating that all dharmas are empty,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la lhag par mos par gyur pa de lta bu ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la lhag par mos par gyur pa de lta bu ni sbyor ba yin no //
translated: he should be devoted to the three doors of liberation: emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness. Such is the application.

original: dge ba ci yin zhes tshol zhing 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can /
analyzed: dge ba ci yin zhes tshol zhing 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can /
translated: He should be naturally inclined to seek out and ask about what is wholesome.

original: go cha chen po bgos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba ni /
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba ni /
translated: Having donned the great armor, he should strive for unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par brtson pa yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par brtson pa yin te /
translated: They are dedicated to the true branches of enlightenment.

original: gang dag lam la zhugs pa de dag 'di snyam du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gang dag lam la zhugs pa de dag 'di snyam du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhes bya ba nas / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Those who have entered the path think, “I will attain the fruit of stream-entry.”

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par bya'o @7a * //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par bya'o @7a * //
translated: In the same way, they think, “I will attain the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and arhatship.”

original: snyam du / de'i bya ba la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: snyam du / de'i bya ba la gnas pa yin te /
translated: They are dedicated to the practice of the path.

original: dge ba'i chos rnams la gong dag khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos rnams la gong dag khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to understand the higher teachings on wholesome qualities,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa 'di tsam zhig gis ni sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa 'di tsam zhig gis ni sbyor ba yin no //
translated: they are dedicated to the practice of the path.

original: ngan song gsum las grol ba rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang ; phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa bya ba byas pa dag ni grol ba zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ngan song gsum las grol ba rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang ; phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa bya ba byas pa dag ni grol ba zhes brjod do //
translated: Those who are liberated from the three lower realms are called stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, and arhats who have done their duty.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gang dag yang bslab pa gsum po dag la bslab pa de dag ni grol ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gang dag yang bslab pa gsum po dag la bslab pa de dag ni grol ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Śāriputra, those who train in the three trainings are called liberated.

original: de dag kyang dad pas byin pa 'thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang dad pas byin pa 'thob pa yin no //
translated: They also receive gifts out of faith.

original: sh'a ri'i bu 'di dge tsam gyis sbyor ba yin zhing /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu 'di dge tsam gyis sbyor ba yin zhing /
translated: Śāriputra, this is the extent of their practice.

original: 'di dag tsam gyis grol ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag tsam gyis grol ba yin te /
translated: This is the extent of their liberation.

original: de lta bu'i sbyor ba dang / de lta bu'i grol ba gang yin pa de dag la ngas dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sbyor ba dang / de lta bu'i grol ba gang yin pa de dag la ngas dad pas byin pa rjes su gnang ngo //
translated: I allow gifts of faith for those who have such practice and such liberation.

original: de dag gis legs par yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de dag gis legs par yongs su spyad par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: They will use them well.”

original: tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra of the Questions of Brahmadatta also says,

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po tshangs pas byin la bka' stsal pa /
